alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:27PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hamilton, western Fulton and east central Herkimer Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 527 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stratford, or 12 miles northeast of Little Falls, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Dolgeville, Stratford, Oppenheim, Arietta, Oregon, Clockmill Corners, Lotville, Rasbach Corner, Doxtater Corner, Knappville, Shaker Place, Piseco, Fical Corners, Morehouseville, Scotchbrush, Hoffmeister, Phipps Corners, Powley Place, Garoga and Canada Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer
